As a Driver/Sales Workers with Bachelor's Degree, your work involves drive truck or other vehicle over established routes or within an established territory and sell or deliver goods, such as food products, including restaurant take-out items, or pick up or deliver items such as commercial laundry. may also take orders, collect payment, or stock merchandise at point of delivery.
